Description:
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely isocyanates is either previewed or where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled, because you have not provided air-fed breathing apparatus

You have failed to ensure that your employees who are, or are liable to be, exposed to substances hazardous to health, which can cause occupational asthma, namely isocyanates, are under suitable health surveillance.

You have failed to ensure that local exhaust ventilation plant provided to control employee exposure to substances hazardous to health, namely isocyanates, has been subject to thorough examination and testing at least once every 14 months.
